utils¶

A set of helper functions to analyze EMDAT data. Importing GNI and population from the World Development Indicators allows key metrics such as disaster losses per capita and percent of GNP affected.

utils.get_GNI(df)¶

Takes a dataframe where the columns are country names and the rows are dates. Returns population from the WDI.

Parameters

df (a Pandas dataframe) –

utils.get_pop(df)¶

Takes a dataframe where the columns are country names and the rows are dates. Returns population from the WDI.

Parameters
